name: Modern Transport City Bus
description:
Commute through city while the best driver in town is on duty. Forget cars and scooters and ride your own city bus to work and schools. Numerous stops on the route, yet modern transport city bus reaches every bus stop in time. Commute and conveyance is one difficult task while trying to excel people management for a crowded city full of people. Obsession to own more cars and vehicles keeps the traffic jams going and inevitably effecting city life. Modern transport city bus keeps the smaller vehicle in homes, taking less space on the road relative to dozens of cars.
Modern Transport City Bus features:
• Realistic traffic and city environment. Media vans and school buses on the roads make the environment more realistic.
• Multiple buses to drive in the modern transport city bus game.
• Amazing controls for most enjoyable driving experience on the busy roads.
• Stop at the traffic signals to pay the respects to the city traffic rules and regulation.
• City is sensational with realistic sky scrapper all over
• Effective and well-functioning map in the city to locate the passengers
• Provide best pick and drop service to passengers while passing through the several bus stops all over the city.
